column7: Our initial push for the new spring clothing line. Focused on light fabrics and floral prints. Generated significant interest in the Maxi Dress.

column9: emphasizing unique handcrafted jewelry. Saw a great uptake in our silver necklaces and pearl bracelets.

column7: Promoting versatile pieces for the summer wardrobe
column8: like the denim jacket and linen trousers. Aiming to highlight layering and comfort for warmer weather.
